title: Can't get old profile to work
content:
Had to re-install Windows 10 Pro 64 bit. Saved Tbird Profiles folder to USB thumb drive. Re-installed Windows then installed latest Tbird version (same one I was using). Opened Choose User Profile > Selected Create Profile > Selected Use the selected profile... > Exited Choose User Profile.

Then went to the thumb drive > Opened a profile folder > Copied everything > Then pasted it into the new profile folder I had just created. Opened TBird but it didn't have any of my settings or emails.

The thumb drive had 3 profile folders in it so I repeated these steps for each folder. But still didn't get my settings, etc.

What am I doing wrong?
creator: t2nrsg5nr8

title: Thunderbird calendar search past event not working

title: My old username is locked out as I can't remember which of 3 email addresses I used when I first set up my account’ for ‘Thunderbird
content:
I have been having intermittent problems with my Touchpad over the past two weeks and no changes to the drivers worked. I then carried out a Reset, retaining all my stuff. Something went wrong and although it retained all my docs, photos etc, it lost the profiles and all my saved passwords in Firefox & Chrome. It's a catastrophe. I have backed up my own files every few months but not things like profiles. I have to start again with everything, including Thunderbird.

I set up TB yesterdayand have all my 8 email accounts linked to it and messages are being received ok. First problem is I can't remember which of my main 3 email accounts I used as the main account. Is it the first account. If not, is there a way of finding it in the Settings?

The second problem, when I wanted to reoly to a message I posted yesterday I couldn't pass the password challenge. I thought I could simply change the password but it seems that could lead to losing some emails. 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1464891  This is the post I       made yesterday under my original username but I can't sign today and had to set up a new account to make this post.

In trying to sign in I was sent numerous codes, many of them did not work eventhough I copied then direct from the message. With an email address only, how can I access this Commun ity as I still have a question about the size on the TB 'dashboard. I wabt tio make almost everything bigger.
creator: toby_hayes

title: Cannot create subfolders since update to 128.2.3esr (64-bit)
content:
I was automatically updated to 128.2.3esr (64-bit) and immediately I have lost the ability to create new subfolders in any part of my folder tree or on any of the accounts I use. Rt-click -> New Subfolder has always opened a little dialog box to name the new folder. Now nothing happens. I have seen a similar user issue reported, but the answer was long and incomprehensible and seemed purely to relate to spam boxes and certain user account types . The issue is still not marked as resolved and is a real pain. Is there a simple way to roll back to the last version while you figure it out?

Best Regards

Peter Rose
creator: peter865

title: Thunderbird email
content: Lost my Thunderbird email application on my computer. No address book, emails, folders etc. Downloaded Thunderbird and started over. The new version is very different from previous version. Can I get the previous version back? Really don't like this version format.

title: Thunderbird's most recent update does not allow me to open many emails properly.
content:
Thunderbird's most recent update does not allow me to open many emails. For example an email from my bank saying an e-transfer has been completed. When I try and open the email I get just one line that says:

_com.samsung.android.email_5468463121860--

When I try and open an email from an arts group I belong to I get the same thing. However if I open the same email from my host server for my website, opens just fine. WHAT HAS HAPPENED???

content: After a recent update, Thunderbird has become unresponsive. The Inbox and folder tree appear when I open the program, and everything freezes. I uninstalled and reinstalled the program but with the same problem.

title: Thunderbird set up
content: I have used Thunderbird for years on an iMac (O.S Monterey 12.7.6) until now when it will not open. I have tried to download and re-set anew and while Thunderbird identifies the in and out servers I always receive the message "UNABLE TO LOG IN AT SERVER PROBABLY WRONG CONFIGURATION,USER NAME, OR PASSWORD'". My full name and email address are correct so I have tried every password I have ever used, without success. iCloud email works ok but I prefer the Thunderbird display. Please help as I do want to keep using Thunderbird which is a really good app. Thank you.
creator: handlmyers

title: Unable to delete 805 messages from Inbox
content: I have version 115.15.0 TB. All works fine except : I tried to delete 805 old messages from Inbox. I received an error saying I needed to under the File menu Empty Trash. I did that by clicking Empty Trash. It said to then Compact Folders. I did that. Then I tried to delete all old emails beginning 7/31/2024 and going back. I still got the same error. So, I deleted them in small batches. So, everything from 7/31 backward is now deleted. But it should have been one simple task. I don't know why this happened.
creator: jworks

title: Calendar
content: What has happened recently to the Thunderbird calendar? It has become so unreliable. I get some notifications but not others. This has been happening for a while but it's worse now. It started off with notifications for repeated events not working. Now it's happening with new events, too. But it only happens with some, not all. This comes after the search facility for past events was inexplicably withdrawn. I've read other posts on that, but the focus of this question is the unreliability of notifications. Version 128.2.3esr (32-bit).

title: Some new mails don't get downloaded on laptop but shown in web interface (Firefox)
content:
I have been using Thunderbird on my laptop with Windows 10, for a few years now without any problem. I have 3 accounts (IMAP) configured viz. 1 from Yahoo & 2 from Gmail.

A few days back I noticed that Thunderbird is not downloading all new mails on the laptop. Some mails can be seen in web interface but not in Thunderbird on laptop.

I tried all solutions like repair etc. but issue is still not resolved. Can someone help with the solution?

Thunderbird version 115.3.1.
creator: sandeepvaidya
